name: Bad Beat (Probaru)
description:
Bad Beat will have you defending three performers on a podium as body guards whilst also entertaining the crowd by doing so. The crowd is especially vicious, so make sure nobody gets hurt!

Bring a friend!

You and your friend will be deflecting the various objects thrown onto the podium as quickly as possible, make sure the performers don't get knocked out and don't let the crowd get too bored!

THE GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS,  BEWARE!

===

Created by:

Art & Game Design: Probaru

Coding & Game Design: Ilian

Song used was made by: Reach x CaptainComedy
